definition: to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: After that, everybody pelted snowballs at anybody who was riding the sled.
sentences.chinese: 那之后，每个人都对著坐雪橇滑下来的人砸雪球。

sentences.english: A gaggle of schoolgirls followed the tennis star to his car.
sentences.chinese: 一群叽哩呱啦的女学生跟著网球明星到他的车子。

sentences.english: You are responsible for sustaining well-informed and motivated Rotary clubs.
sentences.chinese: 您有责任提供最新的资讯并激励著扶轮社。
旁边躺著的就是你的爱人。

sentences.english: He was interviewed during his visit to Japan this week.
sentences.chinese: 是趁著前两天金范来日时，额外作的访谈。

sentences.english: Inscribed with a dozen or more function scales, the slide rule symbolized the mysteries of arcane science.
sentences.chinese: 计算尺上刻著十几种函数刻度，宛如科学奥秘的化身。

sentences.english: Emily scuffed past in her mother's slippers.
sentences.chinese: 艾米丽趿拉著她母亲的拖鞋走过去了。

sentences.english: Even if accompanied with dreary day let us smile with teats .
sentences.chinese: 即使阴雨作伴让我们流泪著欢笑。

sentences.english: A third text is Gherand Samhita by the great sage Gherand .
sentences.chinese: 第三部是圣人格兰达所著的《格兰达集》。

sentences.english: Am I trying to do the job that cupid or God suppose to do?
sentences.chinese: 我是否尝试著做上帝跟邱比特的工作？

sentences.english: Worry is like carrying a load of feathers we think are lead.
sentences.chinese: 焦虑就像是我们扛著一包羽毛，却认为是铅。

sentences.english: He came out of the library, a large book under his.
sentences.chinese: 他夹著本厚书，走出了图书馆。

sentences.english: After forty minutes of interaction with the students, everyone says they are inspired to follow an eco-friendly way of life.
sentences.chinese: 四十分钟的互动下来，孩子们的环保心也跟著被启发。

sentences.english: Today even Tibetan monks in Chinese areas carry Tibetan flags.
sentences.chinese: 现在，甚至到汉区的藏僧，都带著雪山狮子旗。

sentences.english: Floral wallpaper adorned the walls of the guest room.
sentences.chinese: 客房的墙上裱糊著有花卉图案的壁纸。

sentences.english: A true friend is someone who reaches for your hand and touches your heart.
sentences.chinese: 一个真正的朋友是向著你伸手，触动你心灵的人。

definition: Concise History of the Chinese Novel by Lu Xun 鲁迅
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Xiao3 shuo1 Shi3 lu:e4

definition: author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
surname Adorno/Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund Adorno 狄奧多·阿多諾|狄奥多·阿多诺[Di2 ao4 duo1 · A1 duo1 nuo4] (1903-1969), German sociologist, philosopher, musicologist, and composer
Ji Yun (1724-1805), Qing Dynasty writer, author of supernatural novel Notes on a Minutely Observed Thatched Hut 閱微草堂筆記|阅微草堂笔记
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
Pu Songling (1640-1715), author of 聊齋志異|聊斋志异[Liao2 zhai1 Zhi4 yi4]
